name: Click Tycoon
description:
Click Tycoon is a business simulator about earning money on the Internet. Work on multiple websites to get money. Complete researches, upgrade your items and register on different sevices to get more. Pay attention to ratings and increase your "antithief" score to get rid of scammers. During the work special icons will appear. Just click them to earn!

NOTE: My English is not perfect. I'm sorry for this.

FEATURES:

  • Cartoon (last level using a photo) 2D graphics.
  • "Clicky" gameplay. Click green icons to earn money during the work and avoid red ones.
  • Campaign. Complete 4 levels of the game's campaign. Become the richest "money maker" on the Internet!
  • 18 researches to complete. 9 services to register.
  • 16 types of work. Each of them may give you more money or less.
  • "Tournament" mode (coming soon). Play with AI. Invite others to be your ally (referral) or enemy.
  • Mod support (coming soon). Want to add new researches, types of work, services or something else? Well, you can!

I hope you'll enjoy this clicker!

It's a beta version of the game. Click Tycoon is still in development.

You can report bugs here: fednazar24@ukr.net. You can also leave a comment about a bug.

  • Processor: x64 or x86.

NOTE: The game was tested on Windows 7 x64 only.
